remarks: The predicate " ` N ` is a neighborhood of point ` P ` ."  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
statement:
neifval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
isneip $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ P e. X ) -> ( N e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { P } ) <-> ( N C_ X /\ E. g e. J ( P e. g /\ g C_ N ) ) ) ) $.
$d J g $.
$d N g $.
$d P g $.
$d X g $.
